name: CNN
text: "I don't see any way that the Democrats or the Republicans quite honestly can safely have a convention with that many people," says Boston Mayor Marty Walsh about Democratic and Republican conventions in August. "I think forcing it is not the way to go." https://t.co/QC97ZiVOU7 https://t.co/VlFIgwvlj3

name: CNN
text:
Peru was one of the first nations in the Americas to have strict coronavirus measures, like stay-at-home orders, curfews and border closings. So how did it become one of the hardest-hit?

Peru is second only to Brazil for cases and deaths in Latin America. https://t.co/rYNyJ1LweV

name: CNN
text: Chicago saw its deadliest Memorial Day weekend in four years despite dips in recent years in gun violence and the sanctioned stay-at-home orders https://t.co/QQIqyPMnCq

name: CNN
text: The mayor of Daytona Beach, Florida, Derrick Henry said the city needs to educate visitors about the rules and regulations that have been put in place to try to prevent the spread of coronavirus https://t.co/YBdqQiZw1W

name: CNN
text:
Imagine a smartphone app that has access to your medical records and assigns you a daily score based on your preconditions, recent checkups and lifestyle habits. 

This is what one Chinese city has envisioned for its more than 10 million residents. https://t.co/ATZJ14nKT8

name: CNN
text: Photos and video of Memorial Day weekend celebrations across the US showed plenty of people going to the beach and gathering on boardwalks, but not a lot of people social distancing or wearing masks. https://t.co/4WKQlVKUtI

name: CNN
text:
The mayor of Manaus — a city of 2 million people that has been stricken by Covid-19 — called on Jair Bolosonaro to resign, "shut up and stay at home."

The President's "dream" is to be a dictator, "but he's too stupid," Arthur Virgilio Neto told CNN. https://t.co/H1EcjieAD2

name: CNN
text: The actress, who turned 98 in January, says she's feeling grateful as she makes life at home peaceful while self-isolating to protect herself from the virus. https://t.co/Cko1neVWzU
